document_data.name: Ricks Garven
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ricks Garven''' was a [[human]] commoner in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] who lived in [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Rivington]] district.

{{quote|''There's probably only a handful of rotten apples among them. But you know what they say about rot... It spreads quickly. Ruins the whole bunch.''|Ricks Garven}}
document_data.Description: Ricks was a human man with a light skin tone, blonde hair and beard, and dark blue eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the army assembled by the [[Cult of the Absolute]] moved from the [[Moonrise Towers]] in [[Chionthar Valley]] to menace the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], displacing countless refugees along the way in the process. Some of the Baldurians did not take kindly to the refugees flooding the outskirts of the city, while others took to protesting. Ricks Garven was among the protestors in Rivington, who thought that the refugee tent city hid treacherous agents of the Absolute in their midst.
